Posts.Content: mackool wrote: hi all nice to find a site like this. had lumps checked out about 2 years ago. stated i had fatty tissue. im size 12/14 breast size 38b. just lately (for past 3 months) have a lot of back pain in same area as chest too.. right in the middle of breast area..*(top of right lung)  chronic it is. never goes.. only gets worse. i have massive pain attacks, like being shot!!.. lasts about 2 to 15 mins.. so dr sent me for xray n blood tests today. as wheezy too he gave inhaler to try. my question is ..im trying find info on gaps/ holes appearing in breast? left breast near to nipple is a large gap/ hole appeared.. about 3 inch round. so quite substantial. very noticable when arms raised and looking in mirror..  anyone have any symptoms like this?
